body.p: Although some respondents to the 2015 Exposure Draft expressed a concern that subjectivity could result if the nature of an entity’s business activities were to be considered when selecting a measurement basis, many supported this approach. In addition, the Board noted that, in many cases, the nature of an entity’s business activities is a matter of fact, not an opinion or management intent. When this is not the case, the Board will need to consider how to address any subjectivity.
